original_title: Netanyahu a ‘war hero’ – Trump — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has rejected any territorial concessions by Ukraine in negotiations with Russia, emphasizing that such decisions must be made by Kiev. He compared the Russian demand for Ukraine to give up parts of Donbass to a proposal for the US to give up Florida. Meanwhile, a Western-trained Ukrainian sabotage group was busted by Russian law enforcement, planning terrorist attacks against Russian transport infrastructure.</s>
